mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_TB ( REPLY_CODE , BOARD_CODE , HGRNK_REPLY_CODE , REPLY_TEXT , RGSTUS_ID , RGDT_DT , UPDT_DT , USE_YN ) VALUES ( ('REPLY_' || LPAD(reply_seq.nextval,8,0)) , #{boardCode} , #{hgrnkReplyCode} , #{replyText} , #{rgstusId} , sysdate , sysdate , 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_CODE as replyCode , REPLY_TEXT as replyText , HGRNK_REPLY_CODE as hgrnkReplyCode , (SELECT USER_INFO.USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_INFO.USER_CODE = REPLY_TB.RGSTUS_ID) as rgstusId , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as updtDt FROM REPLY_TB WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY RGDT_DT

SELECT REPLY_CODE as replyCode , REPLY_TEXT as replyText , HGRNK_REPLY_CODE as hgrnkReplyCode , RGSTUS_ID as rgstusCode , (SELECT USER_INFO.USER_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_INFO.USER_CODE = REPLY_TB.RGSTUS_ID) as rgstusId , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as updtDt FROM REPLY_TB WHERE REPLY_CODE = #{replyCode}
